SELECT t.*,
RANK() OVER(ORDER BY search DESC) AS ranking
FROM TOUR t
LEFT JOIN CATEGORY c USING(category_id)
LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

SELECT t.*, (SELECT img_path FROM TOURIMG WHERE tour_rank = t.tour_rank LIMIT 1) img_path, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY search DESC) AS ranking
FROM TOUR t
LEFT JOIN CATEGORY c USING(category_id)
WHERE city = #{city}
LIMIT 3

SELECT t.*,
u.user_id, u.user_name,
i.tour_img_no AS tour_img_no, i.img_path AS img_path,
c.category_id
FROM TOUR t
INNER JOIN USER u USING(user_id)
LEFT JOIN TOURIMG i USING(tour_rank)
LEFT JOIN CATEGORY c USING(category_id)
WHERE tour_rank = #{tourRank}
